item.title: Passing the Big, Beautiful Bill
item.description: Republicans need to be willing to say ‘no’ to the moderates in the caucus.

item.title: Rich D.C. Colleges Don’t Deserve Taxpayer Giveaways
item.description: Taxpayers in Washington should not be subsidizing wealthy institutions while funding for essential city services is slashed to the bone.

item.title: The Mission of Pope Leo XIV Is Not Kid’s Play
item.description: Is a renewal of innocence and courage afoot in Rome?

item.title: Americans Want Congress to Create Tax-Free Savings Accounts
item.description: Universal savings accounts would allow more families to build wealth and achieve financial independence.

item.title: DEI Still Lurks in Local Government
item.description: Progress at the federal level in rolling back DEI will be slow to affect citizens if we don’t realize what’s still in place locally, in cities like So...
